description: Structured information on a research project.
label: Project
name: Project

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description of this project.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name (title) for this project.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.label: Full name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.name: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasRe._instruction: Add all research products or research product versions that are part of this project.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasRe.label: Has research products
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasRe.name: hasResearchProducts

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) to the homepage of this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.label: Homepage
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.name: homepage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proje._instruction: Add one or several project leader (person or organization).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proje.label: Project leader
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proje.name: projectLeader

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this project.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.label: Short name
